mapper.select: select distinct if(count(g_save_no) = 0, 1, g_save_no+1 ) as g_save_no from grade order by g_save_no desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into grade(uid, tno, g_save_no, grade, g_subject, g_subject_grade, g_date) values(#{user.uid}, #{testName.tno}, #{g_save_no}, #{grade}, #{g_subject}, #{g_subject_grade}, #{g_date})
